statement:
mpbir3and.1 $e |- ( ph -> ch ) $.
mpbir3and.2 $e |- ( ph -> th ) $.

mpbir3and.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ( ch /\ th /\ ta ) ) ) $.
